scripts.wip:angular: npm run setup:angular && npm run setup:angular:extras
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run setup:monorepo
scripts._start: npx -y npm-run-all setup:stencil setup:angular setup:angular:extras setup:react setup:react:extras setup:vue setup:vue:extras setup:stencil:extras
scripts.start: npx -y npm-run-all setup:stencil setup:angular setup:angular:extras setup:react setup:vue setup:stencil:extras
scripts.post-start: npx -y npm-run-all --parallel build:angular build:react build:vue && npm run setup:storybook
scripts.poststart: npx -y npm-run-all build:angular build:react build:vue && npm run setup:storybook
scripts.postclean: npm run uninstall:all && npm run env
scripts.pre-uninstall:all: npx -y npm-run-all --parallel uninstall:stencil uninstall:angular uninstall:react uninstall:vue
scripts.uninstall:all: npx -y npm-run-all uninstall:stencil uninstall:angular uninstall:react uninstall:vue
scripts.uninstall:angular: npm uninstall --global angular-workspace && npm uninstall --global angular-library
scripts.presetup:stencil: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages && npx -y create-stencil components stencil-library && cd stencil-library && npm i
scripts.postsetup:stencil: node .bin/index css2scss && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Stencil commit'
scripts.presetup:stencil:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.setup:stencil:extras: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/files/stencil/stencil.config.ts ./$npm_package_config_project/packages/stencil-library/stencil.config.ts && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Stencil update'
scripts.postsetup:stencil:extras: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/stencil-library && npm run build && npm link
scripts.setup:angular: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj && npm uninstall jasmine-core @types/jasmine && npx -y -p @angular/cli ng generate library $npm_package_config_ng_lib
scripts.presetup:angular:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.postsetup:angular:extras: cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Angular commit'
scripts.pre-build:angular: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj && npm link stencil-library && npm link
scripts.build:angular: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj && npm run build && npx -y -p @angular/cli ng build $npm_package_config_ng_lib
scripts.setup:react: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/react-library && npm i react react-dom typescript @types/react --save-dev
scripts.postsetup:react: node .bin/index react && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'React commit'
scripts._presetup:react:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.prebuild:react: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/react-library && npm link stencil-library && npm link
scripts.postsetup:vue: node .bin/index vue && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Vue commit'
scripts._presetup:vue:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.prebuild:vue: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/vue-library && npm link stencil-library && npm link
scripts.postsetup:monorepo: cd $npm_package_config_project && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'Initial commit' && npm install typescript @types/node --save-dev
scripts.post-setup:monorepo: cd $npm_package_config_project && npx -y lerna init --packages='packages/*' && npm i && npm install typescript @types/node --save-dev
